description: Elegant men's mechanical watch featuring a stainless steel case, blue sunburst dial, and automatic movement. Known for its craftsmanship and classic design. Granny's Gift.
Iconic chronograph with manual winding movement, hesalite crystal, and tachymeter bezel. Famously worn during Apollo moon missions.
Legendary diving watch featuring a black Cerachrom bezel, automatic movement, and 300-meter water resistance. A benchmark in luxury sports timepieces.
Stylish automatic watch with sapphire case back, day-date function, and a clean silver dial. Suited for both professional and casual wear.
Classic Swiss timepiece with an 80-hour power reserve, Roman numerals, and transparent case back. Celebrates traditional watchmaking heritage.
Elegant dress watch featuring moonphase complication, automatic movement, and barleycorn-pattern dial. Known for precision and refinement.
Durable carbon-core guard structure, analog-digital hybrid display, and 200-meter water resistance. A minimalist yet rugged design.
Solar-powered diver's watch with ISO certification, black polyurethane strap, and luminous markers. Environmentally friendly and reliable.
Military-inspired manual wind watch with matte stainless steel case, durable NATO strap, and 80-hour power reserve. A rugged, utilitarian classic.
Pilotâ€™s chronograph with in-house B01 automatic movement, slide rule bezel, and a high-contrast dial. Celebrated for aviation heritage and engineering.
Affordable automatic diving watch with a stainless steel case, unidirectional bezel, and exhibition case back. Offers solid value for entry-level collectors.
Casual quartz chronograph with an interchangeable strap system, Indiglo night-light, and classic dial layout. Known for practicality and affordability.
